name: The Paradox Effect
description:
A Game Created By YouTubers: Reece Geofroy And Sam Hogan

Your Father has committed a horrible crime that is irreversible...unless...you can go back in time and assassinate your Grandfather before your Father was born!

Stuck in a paradox of killing the person to not be able to create you, for you to then not be able to kill them in the alternate past, you are stuck in an infinite loop trying to rid the past of past selves.

CONTROLS:

WASD = Movement
Left Click = Throw Weapon
